fields.content:
DARE-BIGJOB

DARE-BIGJOB is a Gateway for BigJob based applications which builds upon the Dynamic Application Runtime-Environment (DARE) Framework.

At the moment, there are no general-purpose community accounts, and it requires registrations contacting us before using services. For more information, contact us. For information about SAGA and SAGA-Bigjob, please visit this link link

Dynamic Application Runtime Environment(DARE)

This project is being developed by Cyber-Infrastructure Develop (CyD) Group at Center for Computational Technology(CCT)

Project Lead:
Dr. Shantenu Jha (sjha@cct.lsu.edu)

Team:
Steve Brandt (sbrandt@cct.lsu.edu)
Ole Weidner (oweidner@cct.lsu.edu)
Sharath Maddineni (smaddineni@cct.lsu.edu)

Funding: ExTENCI

DARE-BIGJOB

DARE-BIGJOB is a Gateway for BigJob based applications which builds upon the Dynamic Application Runtime-Environment (DARE) Framework.

At the moment, there are no general-purpose community accounts, and it requires registrations contacting us before using services. For more information, contact us. For information about SAGA and SAGA-Bigjob, please visit this Link

Machine Location Info Job Submission Type
Cyder LSU/CCT 12 core, 5.2 TB HD SAGA/SSH
Queen Bee LONI 8 core/node, 512 Nodes GLOBUS/SAGA
OSG Condor/glidein/SAGA
All scripts are now under testing(beta), however please contact smaddineni@cct.lsu.edu for information about the available scripts.

DARE-BIGJOB

  • How cactus is carried out?

    • Launching optimum size of resources

  • Input DATA:

    Will be provided by the user while submitting a job(thorn file, parameter file)

  • Features

    Distributed Computing

  • Steps

    Stage-1
    Step-1: Create DARE working directories and cactus build directories
    Step-2: Transfer thorn-file and parameter-file to remote machine
    Step-3: Downnload Getcomponents via WGET
    Step-4: Run Getcomponents with the given thornfile
    Step-5: Now transfer the cactus_installer.py file ("cactus_installer.py" checks for the executable 'cactus_sim' exists or not and builds cactus if necessary.)
    Step-6: run cactus_installer.py to actually build cactus with downloded thorns if necessary.
    Stage-2
    Step-1(7): Create cactus simulation directory
    Step-2(8): Run cactus simulation through cactus mpi and given parameter file
    Step-3(9): Tar the output parameter file
    Step-4(10):Transfer the output file back to this server.

  • Advantages

    Usability and Scalability along with faster results due to Distributed Computing

DARE-BIGJOB

DARE-BIGJOB is a Gateway for BigJob based applications which builds upon the Dynamic Application Runtime-Environment (DARE) Framework.

At the moment, there are no general-purpose community accounts, and it requires registrations contacting us before using services. For more information, contact us. For information about SAGA and SAGA-Bigjob, please visit this Link
